titles.title: Advisory Council on California Indian Policy Extension Act of 1997
Advisory Council on California Indian Policy Extension Act of 1997
Advisory Council on California Indian Policy Extension Act of 1998
Advisory Council on California Indian Policy Extension Act of 1998
Advisory Council on California Indian Policy Extension Act of 1998
Advisory Council on California Indian Policy Extension Act of 1998
To extend the Advisory Council on California Indian Policy to allow the Advisory Council to advise Congress on the implementation of the proposals and recommendations of the Advisory Council.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Executive Comment Requested from Interior, HHS.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Resources. H. Rept. 105-571.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 323.

action.text: Mr. Young (AK) moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate,

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Indian Affairs.

calendar.text: Committee on Indian Affairs. Ordered to be reported with an amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Indian Affairs. Reported to Senate by Senator Campbell with an amendment. With written report No. 105-342.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 595.

action.text: Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.
The committee amendment was rejected by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 10/9/1998--Passed Senate amended. Advisory Council on California Indian Policy Extension Act of 1998 - Amends the Advisory Council on California Indian Policy Act of 1992 to direct the Advisory Council on California Indian Policy to: (1) work with the Congress, the Secretaries of the Interior and Health and Human Services, and the California Indian tribes to implement the proposals and recommendations contained in the Council's report to the Congress; and (2) submit annual progress reports on such implementation to specified congressional committees. Extends the Council through March 31, 2000.
